name: Broken But Still Beautiful
description:
Broken But Still Beautiful is my entry for the 2020 Christian Devs Speedgame: Hard Mode.

Play as a young lady, broken physically as she is bound to a wheelchair, but is still beautiful, as she has a tender and compassionate soul and won't use her disability as an excuse to find some poor lost children.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Esc to Pause

Objective:

Find the 10 Missing Children
